text: Walter Annables (31 October 1911 – 16 August 1979) was an English former professional footballer who played as a full-back. ==References== Category:1911 births Category:1979 deaths Category:People from Swinton, South Yorkshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Mexborough Athletic F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Hull City A.F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Wally Annables
